personalSpace.title: This is a Personal space
personalSpace.message: To invite others and share songs, you need to create an organization. You can create an organization from the dropdown in the top right.

leaveOrganization.title: Leave organization
leaveOrganization.message: Are you sure you want to leave this organization? You will lose access to all songs and organization specific items.

deleteOrganization.title: Delete organization
deleteOrganization.message:
Are you sure you want to remove this organization? All songs and associated data will be removed.
This action cannot be undone.
